trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event that occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> moves.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref>所發生的事件時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>移動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value and the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventArgs"></xref>使用指定的類別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref>列舉值和新的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> movement that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> </xref>描述類型的列舉值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>造成事件的移動。

trans-unit.source: The value that corresponds to the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

Performs the appropriate type casting to call the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 執行適當的型別轉換為類型安全的呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventHandler"></xref>委派<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The current object along the event's route.
trans-unit.target: 路由事件的目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示的新位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new value corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 新的值會對應到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項，它實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: The value that corresponds to the new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position that caused this event.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref>描述中的變更列舉值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>造成此事件的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> movement that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> </xref>描述類型的列舉值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>造成移動<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref>事件。
